dublin_core.dcvalue: U-Report is a text-based youth engagement tool with real-time data analysis that uses community communication to identify health needs, raise awareness, identify health sector gaps, and establish a strong long-term system post-emergency.
Community member, CHW, CHW, Facility-based provider, Facility
Stuart Campo, UNICEF Innovation Development Specialist, UNICEF, Email: scampo@unicef.org; James Powell, U-Report Global Coordinator & Strategist, UNICEF, Email: jpowell@unicef.org
Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Child health, Infectious diseases
